content: **note** you must register at freepatterns com to be able to access the free patterns also available at free-crochet com 1 the pattern requires 1 ball each of 300 yds in two colours of size 10 crochet thread and a size 5 steel hook mm not specified 1 https //www free-crochet com/crochet_doilies/vintage_doilies/
